## Public Member Functions

### canConvertIf() {#ad73f79350d54fe535469c4a148943e3a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SSAIfConv::canConvertIf (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, bool Predicate=false)</>}>
canConvertIf - If the sub-CFG headed by MBB can be if-converted, initialize the internal state, and return true.

canConvertIf - analyze the sub-cfg rooted in MBB, and return true if it is a potential candidate for if-conversion.

If predicate is set try to predicate the block otherwise try to speculatively execute it.

Fill out the internal state.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00182">182</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### convertIf() {#a97a97757150c110b5bceb79ae0fedc1f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SSAIfConv::convertIf (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; RemoveBlocks, bool Predicate=false)</>}>
convertIf - If-convert the last block passed to <a href="#ad73f79350d54fe535469c4a148943e3a">canConvertIf()</a>, assuming it is possible.

convertIf - Execute the if conversion after canConvertIf has determined the feasibility.

Add any blocks that are to be erased to RemoveBlocks.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> basic blocks that need to be erased will be added to RemoveBlocks.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00186">186</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### canPredicateInstrs() {#a119c82679da82706e636a64abedbe783}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SSAIfConv::canPredicateInstrs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB)</>}>
Return true if all non-terminator instructions in MBB can be safely predicated.

canPredicateInstrs - Returns true if all the instructions in MBB can safely be predicates.

The terminators are not considered.

If instructions use any values that are defined in the head basic block, the defining instructions are added to InsertAfter.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> clobbered regunits are added to ClobberedRegUnits.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00147">147</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### canSpeculateInstrs() {#afd124267ebb1dac07ea430c9c972df30}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SSAIfConv::canSpeculateInstrs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB)</>}>
Return true if all non-terminator instructions in MBB can be safely speculated.

canSpeculateInstrs - Returns true if all the instructions in MBB can safely be speculated.

The terminators are not considered.

If instructions use any values that are defined in the head basic block, the defining instructions are added to InsertAfter.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> clobbered regunits are added to ClobberedRegUnits.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### findInsertionPoint() {#a20eab3651bf239488a271898bb2259bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool SSAIfConv::findInsertionPoint ()">
Find a valid insertion point in Head.

Find an insertion point in Head for the speculated instructions.

The insertion point must be:


<ul>
<li>Before any terminators.</li>
<li>After any instructions in InsertAfter.</li>
<li>Not have any clobbered regunits live.</li>
</ul>


This function sets <a href="/docs/api/structs/insertionpoint">InsertionPoint</a> and returns true when successful, it returns false if no valid insertion point could be found.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00158">158</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### InstrDependenciesAllowIfConv() {#a1a41d44033d3fbc13cd7552a4a739395}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SSAIfConv::InstrDependenciesAllowIfConv (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; I)</>}>
Scan through instruction dependencies and update InsertAfter array.

Check that there is no dependencies preventing if conversion.

Return false if any dependency is incompatible with if conversion.

If instruction uses any values that are defined in the head basic block, the defining instructions are added to InsertAfter.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00151">151</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### PredicateBlock() {#a20c380bd19b7fb1b0bd4dcc43bbde79d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SSAIfConv::PredicateBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, bool ReversePredicate)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a> all instructions of the basic block with current condition except for terminators.

Reverse the condition if ReversePredicate is set.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00155">155</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### replacePHIInstrs() {#a3d4ad9bdf4c8464c29b50d2958b84327}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SSAIfConv::replacePHIInstrs ()">
Replace PHI instructions in Tail with selects.

replacePHIInstrs - Completely replace PHI instructions with selects.

This is possible when the only Tail predecessors are the if-converted blocks.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00161">161</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### rewritePHIOperands() {#adbfc8fedd475e0bb6f6d3cb8a172c613}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SSAIfConv::rewritePHIOperands ()">
Insert selects and rewrite PHI operands to use them.

rewritePHIOperands - When there are additional Tail predecessors, insert select instructions in Head and rewrite PHI operands to use the selects.

Keep the PHI instructions in Tail to handle the other predecessors.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp/#l00164">164</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/earlyifconversion-cpp">EarlyIfConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
